about_the_game:
Welcome to Creature Park!
Tired of your boring daily routine? Welcome to Creature Park, where you can immerse yourself in a world filled with extraordinary creatures! As a member of the Creature Park team, you'll be working in the dark areas of the zoo, not the bright ones. But don't worry! We have proper manuals and advanced technology that can greatly assist you, as long as you have the money. If a problem arises... another person will come, so we're fine with it!

Capture the Creatures!


You'll be dispatched to dangerous areas to capture creatures yourself. Each creature has its own unique traits. Observe them carefully and exploit their weaknesses!

Manage the Zoo!


The creatures you capture will live in the zoo. If you don't want to see them rampaging, make sure to fulfill their needs. Your small choices can have significant impacts on the zoo's operations... see for yourself!

Various Threats


The dangerous areas are home to a variety of creatures. Remember, you are the prey, not the predator.

Cooperative Play


We encourage you to form a team and act together! While it might be challenging alone, many things are possible with a group!
